If response 1 is better, write 1.

## Input
### Prompt
What’s your most favorite pooping position?

### Response 1: 
Definitely hands down my most favorite pooping position is squatting over the toilet, especially when using a bidet for post-poop cleanse. Sitting or kneeling seem to be slightly less convenient, so they are not high on my favorite list.

### Response 2: 
I don't have a favorite pooping position, but I usually aim to go for a walk after I poop so I can get my bowels Moving in every direction. That way, I don't have to poop all too often. Yuck!
